title: When do we go to sujood in prayer when we cannot see the Imam? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in sramos from australia he says when we don't see the imam when do we prostrate the sunnah is if you see the imam not to bend your back until the forehead of the imam reaches the floor even if he says allahu akbar and he goes down you don't move until he reaches the floor but if you're in the back or you can't see the imam then the moment he says akbar if he finishes then you can start to move and allah knows best
